name: Yasuke (Demo)
description:
A/D To Move

Mouse to Attack

Mouse Attack is on a Cooldown

Heart Size = Health

YOU GET MORE POINTS FOR KILLING THINGS HARDER?!!!! BASED???!!!!!

Known issues!:

Some background scrolling issues

Some collision detection all round jank

No blood (yet)

Highscore issues

Made for my final year of Ba Game Design @ LCC, this was a project done in collaboration with two artists and myself, I covered all the technical stuff, and for the majority of the artwork on screen was done by those two, see credits for more information!
